interestingcomments.content:
Gps tracking for the Z50 /!/ Any of you genius people know something about geotagging?

I have a Nikon Z50 and have been using the snapbridge app for my iphone 8 until now.
I want to have very precise gps tracking on my photos and the gps on my phone is not working very well. 
Is there any gps units I can use for better geotagging? 
I remember seeing a box on top of the flash on another Nikon camera, but cant find any for this model.
Ideally the tag would be within 1 meter from where the photo was taken, but now I have seen it beeing over 1 kilometer away. 

For some extra info i am taking photos from a helicopter and will sometimes have bad telephone connections behind mountains.
